name: Pushy-box
description:
This is a  grid-based puzzle game 

Move around with W,A,S,D or Arrow keys 

You can push the yellow boxes around

If you find a black cube it is a pit if you fall in it, you die.

But if you put a box in it you can safely go above it

The big red box is a door and it blocks your way

You are supposed to put a box above the small which is a button

So it will open the door

You should push the blue circle to the black circle to win

Good luck!! and thanks for playing 

Play in full screen
